groups.name: guard4j
groups.description: Configuration properties for Guard4j Spring Boot integration.

groups.name: guard4j.observability
groups.description: Observability settings for Guard4j error handling.

groups.name: guard4j.web
groups.description: Web-specific settings for Guard4j error handling.

properties.name: guard4j.exception-mapping.enabled
properties.description: Enable automatic mapping of Spring exceptions to Guard4j errors.

properties.name: guard4j.observability.enabled
properties.description: Enable observability features such as metrics and tracing for error handling.

properties.name: guard4j.observability.metrics.enabled
properties.description: Enable metrics collection for error events when observability is enabled.

properties.name: guard4j.observability.tracing.enabled
properties.description: Enable tracing for error events when observability is enabled.

properties.name: guard4j.observability.level-overrides
properties.description: Override default log levels for specific error codes. Key is the error code, value is the desired level.

properties.name: guard4j.web.enabled
properties.description: Enable web-specific error handling features when Spring Web is present.

properties.name: guard4j.web.global-exception-handler.enabled
properties.description: Enable the global exception handler for web requests.

properties.name: guard4j.web.global-exception-handler.order
properties.description: Order of the global exception handler. Lower values have higher precedence.

properties.name: guard4j.web.include-stack-trace
properties.description: Include stack traces in error responses. Should be disabled in production.

properties.name: guard4j.web.include-path
properties.description: Include the request path in error responses.
